name: Yellow: Prologue DEMO
description: This is a demo/prototype of my first visual novel using Tyranobuilder. The art is very rough because I was focusing on the story and figuring out how Tyranobuilder worked. There are a few errors here and there that I will sort out on a future version. I want to get this first part out to see how it does and get any feedback I can on the story and how to make the visual novel better. I appreciate you taking the time check out this game I made. It shouldn't take you more than 5-10 minutes to go through it.
